summary: AINetDirectionReference class defines methods for finding node addresses in a given mvAlgsType and direction, and retrieving port based on filter.

details.comment: This code defines a class called AINetDirectionReference, which provides methods for finding the node addresses of directions in a specific mvAlgsType and direction. The class also has a method to retrieve port based on a filter, mvAlgsType, and direction.
Method to retrieve node pointers from a direction reference, using an optional filter function.
